skills.name: Melee Weapons

skills.name: Ranged Weapons
skills.description: Skill with ranged weaponry like bows, crossbows, and firearms.

skills.name: Martial Arts
skills.description: Training in unarmed combat techniques and specialized fighting styles.

skills.name: Self-Defense
skills.description: Ability to protect oneself from physical attacks, focusing on evasion and countermeasures.

skills.name: Explosives
skills.description: Expertise in using and disarming explosive devices.

skills.name: Intimidation
skills.description: Skill in forcing others to act through fear or coercion.

skills.name: Survival
skills.description: Knowledge of survival techniques, including foraging, tracking, and navigating the wilderness.

skills.name: Investigation
skills.description: Ability to analyze clues, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden information.

skills.name: Perception
skills.description: Skill in noticing details in the environment, spotting hidden threats, and detecting ambushes.

skills.name: Athletics
skills.description: Proficiency in physical activities such as climbing, jumping, and swimming.

skills.name: Piloting
skills.description: Skill in operating vehicles or spacecraft with precision and efficiency.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: Ability to move silently and remain unseen, useful for sneaking and evasion.

skills.name: Medicine
skills.description: Expertise in treating injuries, diseases, and stabilizing wounded creatures.

skills.name: History
skills.description: Knowledge of historical events, ancient civilizations, and significant lore.
